name: Easy Bread Machine Dinner Rolls
author: White Lily
summary: Let your bread machine do the work for these tender and light dinner rolls.
ingredients: 3 ½ cups White Lily® All Purpose Wheat Flour, or more as needed
directions: Place water, butter, egg, 3 cups flour blend, sugar, salt and yeast in bread machine pan in order recommended by the manufacturer
During initial mixing cycle, open lid and scrape down sides of bread pan as necessary
As dough mixes, add just enough additional flour blend to create a soft dough
When Dough/Manual cycle is complete, remove dough from bread machine pan
Coat 13 x 9-inch baking pan with cooking spray
Cut with pizza cutter or serrated knife into 15 equal pieces
Cover and let rise in warm place until doubled, about 35 to 45 minutes
Bake 15 minutes or until golden brown
Serve warm or cool completely on wire rack
